t: Amazon.com: DriveTech SB2043 CV Drive Axle : Automotive
s: Not sure what the deal is but going to use a different brand probably should get oem... ... Great product for the price. If you need to replace your CV joint, this will do the job nicely. I installed this on the front of my 2005 Subaru Outback. Currently have about 600 miles on it and no problems. The CV joint takes a bit of force to get seated into the transaxle. The OEM CV joint wasn't nearly as hard to remove or install as this DriveTech ...
